ygData.subject: Re: Defending a Friend.

Burning Hammer smiles.

Burning Hammer: Haha, you are brave, yes, very brave.

The Hero: But not brave enough!

The injured bot Perplex had found exited the base and walked right up beside
Burning Hammer.

The Hero: I am the Hero, and I will save the day. I only waited this long so
that I may...uhh, let you have a chance to fight, kind sir. Now then, how---

Burning Hammer swung a chop to the neck of The Hero, decapitating him in a
single blow...

From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2001 1:04 AM
Subject: Re: Defending a Friend.
